price: 51 Si Nous l’avions voulu, Nous aurions suscité dans chaque cité un Messager chargé d’avertir ses habitants.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
